actions.name: AddApplicationCloudWatchLoggingOption
actions.description: Grants permission to add cloudwatch logging option to the application

actions.name: AddApplicationInput
actions.description: Grants permission to add input to the application

actions.name: AddApplicationInputProcessingConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to add input processing configuration to the application

actions.name: AddApplicationOutput
actions.description: Grants permission to add output to the application

actions.name: AddApplicationReferenceDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to add reference data source to the application

actions.name: AddApplicationVpcConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to add VPC configuration to the application

actions.name: CreateApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to create an application

actions.name: CreateApplicationPresignedUrl
actions.description: Grants permission to create and return a URL that you can use to connect to an application's extension

actions.name: CreateApplicationSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a snapshot for an application

actions.name: DeleteApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the application

actions.name: DeleteApplicationCloudWatchLoggingOption
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified cloudwatch logging option of the application

actions.name: DeleteApplicationInputProcessingConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified input processing configuration of the application

actions.name: DeleteApplicationOutput
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified output of the application

actions.name: DeleteApplicationReferenceDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified reference data source of the application

actions.name: DeleteApplicationSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a snapshot for an application

actions.name: DeleteApplicationVpcConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified VPC configuration of the application

actions.name: DescribeApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the specified application

actions.name: DescribeApplicationOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an application operation of an application

actions.name: DescribeApplicationSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an application snapshot

actions.name: DescribeApplicationVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the application version of an application

actions.name: DiscoverInputSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to discover the input schema for the application

actions.name: ListApplicationOperations
actions.description: Grants permission to list application operations of an application

actions.name: ListApplicationSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to list the snapshots for an application

actions.name: ListApplicationVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list application versions of an application

actions.name: ListApplications
actions.description: Grants permission to list applications for the account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch the tags associated with the application

actions.name: RollbackApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to perform rollback operation on an application

actions.name: StartApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to start the application

actions.name: StopApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to stop the application

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to the application

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the application

actions.name: UpdateApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to update the application

actions.name: UpdateApplicationMaintenanceConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the maintenance configuration of an application
